sentence_text: ISK atau infeksi saluran kemih merupakan penyakit yang disebabkan oleh bakteri, dimana keluhan yang dialami dapat timbul kembali untuk menegakan diagnosa dapat dilihar dari pemeriksaan urin lengkap yaitu salah satunya bakteri (+)
sentence_text_translated: UTI or urinary tract infection is a disease caused by bacteria, where the complaints experienced can come back to confirm the diagnosis can be seen from a complete urine examination, one of which is bacteria (+)

sentence_text: Cara pengobatan ISK yaitu dengan pemberian antibiotik yang sesuai penyebabnya (ciprofloxasin, levofloxasin, amoxicilin, trimethoprim)
sentence_text_translated: How to treat UTI is by giving antibiotics according to the cause (ciprofloxacin, levofloxacin, amoxicilin, trimethoprim)

sentence_text: Apabila pengobatan yang diberikan teratur di minum dan kontrol kembali ke dokter untuk di follow - up perkembangan infeksi ini serta mengikuti saran yang dianjurkan dokter maka prognosanya bagus dan terhindar dari komplikasi yang bisa terjadi
sentence_text_translated: If the treatment given is regularly taken and the control returns to the doctor for follow - up on the development of this infection and follow the advice recommended by the doctor, the prognosis is good and complications can occur

sentence_text: ISK terbagi dua yaitu ISK atas yaitu dari ginjal hingga ureter ISK bawah yaitu dari Kandung kemih hingga uretra
sentence_text_translated: UTI is divided into two, namely upper UTI, namely from the kidneys to the ureters, lower UTI, namely from the bladder to the urethra

sentence_text: Penyebab yang paling sering adalah E Coli

sentence_text: Apabila ISK tidak tertangani dengan baik maka dapat terjadi komplikasi yaitu gangguan ginjal infeksi darah prostatitis sebaiknya segera ke dokter jika anda mengalami komplikasi ini
sentence_text_translated: If a UTI is not handled properly, complications can occur, namely kidney disorders, blood infection, prostatitis, you should immediately see a doctor if you experience these complications

sentence_text: Infeksi Saluran Kemih dapatlah disembuhkan

sentence_text: Berikut saran yang dapat anda lakukan agar ISK tidak kambuh yaitu Minumlah air putih yang banyak karena jika akan membuat anda buang air kecil sering, dimana bakteri akan ikut terbuang dan bakteri sulit berkembang biak
sentence_text_translated: Here are suggestions that you can do so that UTIs don't recur, namely Drink lots of water because if it will make you urinate frequently, where bacteria will be wasted and bacteria are difficult to breed

sentence_text: Setelah buang air kecil dan besar maka bersihkanlah menggunakan tisu atau air dari depan kebelakang
sentence_text_translated: After urinating and defecating, then wipe using a tissue or water from front to back

sentence_text: Bersihkan organ intim anda setelah berhubungan intim

sentence_text: Jika ISK sangat sering kambuh, maka mintalah obat antibiotik untuk pencegahannya
sentence_text_translated: If the UTI recurs very often, then ask for antibiotics for prevention

sentence_text: Bawalah diri anda ke dokter untuk mendapatkan terapi lanjutan dan mendapatkan pemeriksaan urin darah, USG, IVP, BNO, rontgen untuk melihat perkembangan bakteri dan melihat apakah telah terjadi komplikasi atau belum

sentence_text_translated: Frequent use of chemical - based feminine area cleaners so that the pH of the feminine area changes

sentence_text: Saran saya agar Anda memeriksakan diri ke dokter agar dapat dilakukan pemeriksaan fisik lebih lanjut dan evaluasi keadaan Anda menggunakan pemeriksaan penunjang lain jika dibutuhkan, sehingga keluhan yang anda keluhkan dapat ditangani secara tepat
sentence_text_translated: My advice is that you see a doctor so that further physical examination can be carried out and evaluate your condition using other supporting tests if needed, so that the complaints you complain about can be handled appropriately

sentence_text: Saran di rumah yaitu banyak minum air mineral minimal 2L / hari, serta hindari kebiasaan - kebiasaan yang dapat menimbulkan infeksi pada saluran kemih
sentence_text_translated: Suggestions at home are to drink lots of mineral water at least 2L / day, and avoid habits that can cause infections in the urinary tract

sentence_text: Apakah yang Anda maksudkan adalah sebelumnya Anda pernah menderita batu ginjal?
sentence_text_translated: Do you mean that you have had kidney stones before?

sentence_text: Jika memang bukan hal tersebut yang Anda maksudkan, Anda bisa membalas jawaban ini
sentence_text_translated: If that's not what you mean, you can reply to this answer

sentence_text: Batu ginjal terbentuk karena endapan mineral, utamanya dikarenakan kekurangan cairan sehingga mineral tersebut menjadi mengendap dan membentuk batu ginjal
sentence_text_translated: Kidney stones are formed due to mineral deposits, mainly due to lack of fluids so that these minerals become precipitated and form kidney stones

sentence_text: Batu ginjal terdiri dari banyak jenis, namun jenis utamanya adalah: Batu kalsium, karena tingginya kadar kalsium pada urine, bisa karena keturunan maupun gangguan kelenjar paratiroid
sentence_text_translated: Kidney stones consist of many types, but the main types are: Calcium stones, due to high levels of calcium in the urine, can be due to heredity or parathyroid gland disorders

sentence_text: Batu asam urat, akibat tingginya kadar asam urat dalam tubuh
sentence_text_translated: Uric acid stones, due to high levels of uric acid in the body

sentence_text: Batu struvit, yang terbentuk karena infeksi saluran kemih yang berulang, lebih sering terjadi pada wanita
sentence_text_translated: Struvite stones, which form due to repeated urinary tract infections, are more common in women

sentence_text: Batu sistin, sangat jarang, akibat penyakit sistinuria
sentence_text_translated: Cystine stones, very rarely, due to cystinuria

sentence_text: Faktor resiko terkena batu ginjal diantaranya adalah: Pernah mengalami batu ginjal sebelumnya (berhubungan dengan metabolisme tubuh, pola hidup atau penyakit yang mendasarinya)
sentence_text_translated: Risk factors for developing kidney stones include: Having had kidney stones before (related to the body's metabolism, lifestyle or underlying disease)

sentence_text: Riwayat keluarga / faktor keturunan
sentence_text_translated: Family history / hereditary factors

sentence_text: Tidak mengonsumsi cukup air putih, terutama orang yang tinggal di iklim tropis dan sering berkeringat
sentence_text_translated: Not consuming enough water, especially people who live in tropical climates and sweat a lot

sentence_text: Pola makan yang tinggi protein, garam (sodium) dan gula
sentence_text_translated: A diet high in protein, salt (sodium) and sugar

sentence_text: Obesitas
sentence_text_translated: Obesity

sentence_text: Memiliki penyakit tertentu seperti hiperparatiroidisme, sistinuria dan infeksi saluran kemih
sentence_text_translated: Having certain diseases such as hyperparathyroidism, cystinuria and urinary tract infections

sentence_text: Jika Anda memiliki faktor resiko di atas, kemungkinan batu ginjal dapat terulang kembali
sentence_text_translated: If you have the risk factors above, it is possible for kidney stones to recur

sentence_text: Setelah batu ginjal sembuh, agar tidak terulang, hal yang bisa dilakukan adalah: Konsumsi banyak air putih
sentence_text_translated: After the kidney stones have healed, so that they don't happen again, the things you can do are: Consume lots of water

sentence_text: Tidak terlalu banyak makan makanan yang mengandung oksalat seperti teh, okra, ubi, kacang - kacangan, bayam, dan lain – lain
sentence_text_translated: Do not eat too many foods that contain oxalate such as tea, okra, sweet potatoes, beans, spinach, etc

sentence_text: Menjaga berat badan ideal
sentence_text_translated: Maintain ideal body weight

sentence_text: Diet rendah garam dan rendah protein hewani
sentence_text_translated: Low salt and low animal protein diet

sentence_text: Tetap mengonsumsi makanan yang mengandung kalsium, namun hati - hati akan suplemen kalsium
sentence_text_translated: Keep eating foods that contain calcium, but be careful with calcium supplements

sentence_text: Bisa saja hal yang Anda rasakan saat ini adalah terbentuknya batu ginjal kembali, tetapi bisa saja karena kelainan yang lainnya, misalnya infeksi pada ginjal (pyelonefritis) atau nyeri pinggang karena hal lainnya misal nyeri pada otot, tulang, saluran pencernaan atau organ lain
sentence_text_translated: It could be that what you are feeling right now is the formation of kidney stones again, but it could be due to other disorders, such as infection in the kidneys (pyelonephritis) or low back pain due to other things such as pain in the muscles, bones, digestive tract or other organs

sentence_text: Sebaiknya, Anda saat ini memeriksakan diri Anda ke dokter agar mendapatkan pemeriksaan yang lebih rinci, baik wawancara medis, pemeriksaan fisik maupun pemeriksaan penunjang seperti rontgen maupun laboratorium
sentence_text_translated: It is recommended that you now consult a doctor to get a more detailed examination, both medical interviews, physical examinations and supporting examinations such as x - rays and laboratories

sentence_text: Saya mengerti kekhawatiran yang Anda rasakan
sentence_text_translated: I understand the concern you feel

sentence_text: Batu ginjal merupakan kondisi terbentuknya material keras seperti batu di dalam ginjal
sentence_text_translated: Kidney stones are a condition of the formation of hard material such as stones in the kidneys

sentence_text: Material tersebut yang berasal dari endapan sisa zat limbah dalam tubuh yang mengkristal membentuk batu kalsium, batu asam urat, batu struvit, atau batu sistin
sentence_text_translated: The material is derived from the deposition of residual waste substances in the body that crystallize to form calcium stones, uric acid stones, struvite stones, or cystine stones

sentence_text: Gejala batu ginjal dapat berupa nyeri pada perut / punggung bawah / pinggang / selangkangan, sering BAK, nyeri saat BAK, urin berwarna keruh atau kemerahan, mual, atau muntah
sentence_text_translated: Symptoms of kidney stones can include pain in the abdomen / lower back / waist / groin, frequent urination, pain when urinating, cloudy or reddish urine, nausea, or vomiting

sentence_text: Kondisi ini lebih sering mengenai pria dibanding wanita
sentence_text_translated: This condition is more common in men than women

sentence_text: Penyebabnya bermacam - macam, di antaranya: Batu kalsium: terlalu banyak konsumsi makanan yang mengandung kalsium (susu, keju, kacang - kacangan, sarden) atau vitamin D (kedelai, hati sapi, cokelat, teh), hiperaktifitas kelenjar paratiroid
sentence_text_translated: The causes vary, including: Calcium stones: too much consumption of foods that contain calcium (milk, cheese, nuts, sardines) or vitamin D (soy, beef liver, chocolate, tea), hyperactivity of the parathyroid glands

sentence_text: Batu asam urat: terlalu banyak konsumsi makanan yang mengandung purin (kerang, daging kambing, jeroan)
sentence_text_translated: Uric acid stones: too much consumption of foods that contain purines (shellfish, mutton, offal)

sentence_text: Batu struvit: sering mengalami infeksi saluran kemih
sentence_text_translated: Struvite stones: frequent urinary tract infections

sentence_text: Batu sistin: mengalami penyakit sistinuria
sentence_text_translated: Cystine stones: have cystinuria

sentence_text: Jika Anda mengalami gejala batu ginjal, sebaiknya Anda berkonsultasi dengan dokter untuk dilakukan pemeriksaan lanjutan
sentence_text_translated: If you experience symptoms of kidney stones, you should consult a doctor for further examination

sentence_text: Dokter umumnya akan melakukan pemeriksaan fisik dan penunjang (pemeriksaan darah, urin, rontgen)
sentence_text_translated: The doctor will generally perform a physical and supporting examination (blood, urine, x - ray examination)

sentence_text: Jika batu ginjal masih berukuran kecil, dokter umumnya hanya akan meresepkan obat untuk mengurangi keluhan, seperti anti nyeri, anti mual, atau obat penghambat alfa
sentence_text_translated: If the kidney stones are still small, doctors will generally only prescribe drugs to reduce complaints, such as painkillers, anti - nausea, or alpha - blocking drugs

sentence_text: Jika batu ginjal dirasakan cukup besar dan membahayakan, dapat dilakukan terapi pembedahan
sentence_text_translated: If the kidney stone is felt large enough and dangerous, surgical therapy can be performed

sentence_text: Selain itu, Anda dapat melakukan beberapa tips berikut ini: Perbanyak konsumsi air putih 8 - 10 gelas per hari
sentence_text_translated: In addition, you can do the following tips: Increase the consumption of 8 - 10 glasses of water per day

sentence_text: Batasi konsumsi makanan dan minuman yang mengandung zat - zat pemicu timbulnya batu ginjal, seperti kalsium, oksalat, vitamin D, dan protein hewani
sentence_text_translated: Limit consumption of foods and drinks that contain substances that trigger the onset of kidney stones, such as calcium, oxalate, vitamin D, and animal protein

sentence_text: Biasakan olahraga secara teratur
sentence_text_translated: Get used to exercising regularly

sentence_text: Konsumsi susu dan berbagai produk olahannya (keju, yoghurt) sebaiknya dibatasi pada penderita batu ginjal
sentence_text_translated: Consumption of milk and various processed products (cheese, yogurt) should be limited in patients with kidney stones

sentence_text: Hal ini dikarenakan susu mengandung kalsium yang mudah diserap oleh usus dan berpotensi memicu terbentuknya batu ginjal
sentence_text_translated: This is because milk contains calcium which is easily absorbed by the intestines and has the potential to trigger the formation of kidney stones

sentence_text: Penderita batu ginjal disarankan untuk membatasi asupan kalsium maksimal 800 mg per hari untuk pria dan 1200 mg per hari untuk wanita
sentence_text_translated: Patients with kidney stones are advised to limit their calcium intake to a maximum of 800 mg per day for men and 1200 mg per day for women

sentence_text: Hal ini kurang lebih setara dengan 3 sendok makan susu rendah lemak
sentence_text_translated: This is approximately the equivalent of 3 tablespoons of low - fat milk

sentence_text_translated: That's the explanation from us, hopefully it's useful

sentence_text_translated: You can read related information at the following link: Kidney stones, Diet and kidney stones, Diet for kidney stone prevention

sentence_text: Pada dasarnya ginjal manusia akan terus memproduksi air kencing setiap harinya
sentence_text_translated: Basically, the human kidney will continue to produce urine every day

sentence_text: Umumnya buang air kecil dalam sehari adalah 4 - 8 kali atau sebanyak 1 - 1,8 liter
sentence_text_translated: Generally urinating in a day is 4 - 8 times or as much as 1 - 1 8 liters

sentence_text: Akan tetapi beberapa orang dapat mengalami peningkatan dalam buang airnya
sentence_text_translated: However, some people may experience an increase in bowel movements

sentence_text: Berikut beberapa penyebab meningkatnya frekuensi buang air kecil : Infeksi saluran kemih, Kandung kemih yang terlalu aktif, Infeksi ginjal, Batu ginjal, Kehamilan, Diabetes, Gangguan prostat, Mengonsumsi obat - obatan diuretik, Stroke atau penyakit syaraf, Faktor psikologis (pikiran)
sentence_text_translated: The following are some of the causes of increased frequency of urination: Urinary tract infections, overactive bladder, kidney infections, kidney stones, pregnancy, diabetes, prostate disorders, taking diuretic drugs, stroke or neurological disease, psychological factors (thoughts)

sentence_text: Jika Anda sudah memeriksakan keadaan Anda dan ternyata baik - baik saja, Anda tidak perlu khawatir akan adanya penyakit yang serius dalam diri Anda
sentence_text_translated: If you have had your condition checked and it turns out to be fine, you don't have to worry about a serious illness in you

sentence_text: Hal ini bisa juga disebabkan faktor pikiran yang sedang cemas atau stres, dan lain – lain
sentence_text_translated: This can also be due to factors of the mind being anxious or stressed, and others

sentence_text: Konsumsi air mineral yang berlebih juga dapat menyebabkan buang air kecil menjadi meningkat
sentence_text_translated: Excessive consumption of mineral water can also cause increased urination

sentence_text: Berikut beberapa tips untuk Anda: Konsumsi air mineral yang rutin minimal 2 liter sehari agar tidak kekurangan cairan
sentence_text_translated: Here are some tips for you: Regularly consume at least 2 liters of mineral water a day so you don't run out of fluids

sentence_text: Jangan menahan kencing agar tidak terjadi ISK atau batu
sentence_text_translated: Do not hold urine to prevent UTIs or stones

sentence_text: Rutin berolahraga
sentence_text_translated: Exercise regularly

sentence_text: Nyeri pinggang sebelah kiri pada dasarnya dapat diakibatkan oleh berbagai kemungkinan penyebab berikut ini: Siatika (penekanan dan iritasi pada saraf skiatik)
sentence_text_translated: Left back pain basically can be caused by the following possible causes: Sciatica (pressure and irritation of the sciatic nerve)

sentence_text: Penyempitan jalur tulang belakang
sentence_text_translated: Narrowing of the spinal pathway

sentence_text: Cedera otot / tulang
sentence_text_translated: Muscle / bone injury

sentence_text: Infeksi ginjal
sentence_text_translated: Kidney infection

sentence_text: Batu ginjal
sentence_text_translated: Kidney stones

sentence_text: Sindrom iritasi usus
sentence_text_translated: Irritable bowel syndrome

sentence_text: Gangguan usus besar, dan sebagainya
sentence_text_translated: Colon disorders, and so on

sentence_text: Anda tidak disarankan untuk mengurut / memijat bagian pinggang yang nyeri
sentence_text_translated: You are not advised to massage / massage the painful waist

sentence_text: Sebaiknya konsultasikan dengan dokter agar penyebabnya dapat ditelusuri lebih lanjut
sentence_text_translated: We recommend that you consult a doctor so that the cause can be investigated further

sentence_text: Melalui pemeriksaan fisik dan tes penunjang yang diperlukan (USG, X - Ray, tes urine, CT Scan) dokter akan mengidentifikasi penyebabnya dan memberikan penanganan yang tepat
sentence_text_translated: Through a physical examination and necessary supporting tests (USG, X - Ray, urine test, CT Scan) the doctor will identify the cause and provide appropriate treatment

sentence_text: Berikut ini anjuran yang dapat dilakukan: Bila nyeri terasa mengganggu Anda dapat mengonsumsi paracetamol atau ibuprofen untuk meredakannya
sentence_text_translated: Here's what you can do: If the pain bothers you, you can take paracetamol or ibuprofen to relieve it

sentence_text: Batasi gerakan tubuh atau aktivitas fisik yang dapat membebani pinggang (membungkuk, mengangkat beban berat dan sebagainya)
sentence_text_translated: Limit body movements or physical activities that can put a strain on the waist (bending, lifting heavy weights, etc )

sentence_text: Minum cukup air putih 2 - 3 liter sehari
sentence_text_translated: Drink enough water 2 - 3 liters a day

sentence_text: Hindari kebiasaan menahan keinginan untuk berkemih
sentence_text_translated: Avoid the habit of holding back the urge to urinate

sentence_text: Beristirahat cukup dan konsumsi makanan bergizi untuk menjaga daya tahan tubuh
sentence_text_translated: Get enough rest and eat nutritious food to keep your immune system strong

sentence_text: Kondisi yang Anda alami dengan keluhan utama berupa rasa sakit pada pinggang sebelah kiri kemungkinan mengarah ke gangguan kesehatan pada ginjal dikarenakan adanya gejala tambahan berupa timbulnya buang air kecil (BAK) yang terus - menerus
sentence_text_translated: The condition you are experiencing with the main complaint in the form of pain in the left waist may lead to health problems in the kidneys due to additional symptoms in the form of constant urination

sentence_text: Sakit pinggang dapat disebabkan oleh gangguan ginjal dikarenakan letak ginjal yang terdapat di daerah pinggang
sentence_text_translated: Back pain can be caused by kidney disorders due to the location of the kidneys in the waist area

sentence_text: Jika ginjal terganggu, misalnya dikerenakan adanya suatu infeksi ataupun batu, maka area pinggang dan juga tulang rusuk ke bawah dan panggul akan merasakan rasa nyeri
sentence_text_translated: If the kidneys are disturbed, for example due to an infection or stone, then the waist area and also the lower ribs and pelvis will feel pain

sentence_text: Selain dari gangguan pada ginjal, kondisi yang Anda alami dapat pula disebabkan oleh karena : Siatika, spinal spinosis, otot yang tegang, fibroid pada rahim, kista ovarium, otot yang mengalami ketegangan, dan lain – lain
sentence_text_translated: Apart from kidney problems, the condition you are experiencing can also be caused by: sciatica, spinal spinosis, muscle tension, uterine fibroids, ovarian cysts, muscle tension, etc

sentence_text: Jika hal ini masih saja Anda rasakan, maka Kami sangat menyarankan kepada Anda untuk menemui Dokter Spesialis Penyakit Dalam terlebih dahulu agar dilakukan serangkaian pemeriksaan fisik lebih lanjut
sentence_text_translated: If you still feel this, then we strongly recommend that you see an Internal Medicine Specialist first so that a series of further physical examinations are carried out

sentence_text: Dokter kemungkinan akan melakukan beberapa pemeriksaan terkait kondisi yang Anda alami, yang meliputi : pemeriksaan fisik khususnya daerah pinggang, tes laboratorium darah, tes urine, USG sistem kemih, rontgen tulang belakang, dan lain – lain
sentence_text_translated: The doctor will likely perform several examinations related to the condition you are experiencing, which include: physical examination, especially the waist area, blood laboratory tests, urine tests, ultrasound of the urinary system, spine X - rays, and others

sentence_text: Sehingga penyebab pasti dapat ditemukan dan akhirnya pengobatan yang tepat dapat diberikan
sentence_text_translated: So that the exact cause can be found and finally the right treatment can be given

sentence_text: Dokter akan menganamnesis dan memeriksa fisik Anda, setelah itu mungkin Anda akan diminta melakukan pemeriksaan tambahan seperti pemeriksaan lab darah, urin, USG, x - ray, sesuai indikasi
